code:
export const PROJECTS = [{
  id: 0,
  name: 'Chicago Bikers Real-Time Navigation System',
  image: '/images/attendance.jpg',
  description: 'Developed a mobile application using the React Native framework and utilized React and Express JavaScript for the backend.',
  link: "https://github.com/Sachu23/Flutter-Bike_Navigation",
  feature: true,
  techstack: "Flutter, ReactJS, ExpressJS, NodeJS, MongoDB, REST API",
  renderfirst: false
}, {
  id: 1,
  name: 'MS - GSP (Minimum Support - Generalized Sequential Pattern) Mining Algorithm',
  image: '/images/face.jpg',
  description: 'GSP mining can be used to analyze social media data, such as posts and comments, and identify patterns in the data that indicate trends, sentiment, or other insights.',
  link: 'https://github.com/Sachu23/DMTM---MS-GSP-Algo-Implementation',
  feature: false,
  techstack: "Python, Keras, OpenCV",
  renderfirst: true
}, {
  id: 2,
  name: 'Twitter Sentiment Analysis',
  image: '/images/placements2.png',
  description: 'Built a real-time Twitter sentiment analysis app using Twitter API, Apache Kafka for data streaming, NLP techniques, and CNN for sentiment classification. Visualized results with Heat Maps and stored data in MongoDB',
  link: 'https://github.com/Sachu23/Twitter-Setiment-Analysis',
  feature: true,
  techstack: "Microservices, Twitter API, Apache Kafka, Tensor Flow, MongoDB, Docker-Container, Heat Maps.",
  renderfirst: false
}, {
  id: 3,
  name: 'Ronaldo Goal Prediction',
  image: '/images/ronaldo.jpg',
  description: 'Prediction of whether ronaldo scores a goal or not, based on the data given, like x and y position of where the shot is taken and and how much power is applied during the shot.',
  link: 'https://github.com/rajatkeshri/ZS-HACK-predict-ronaldo-goal',
  feature: false,
  techstack: "Jupyter-Notebook, Keras",
  renderfirst: true
}, {
  id: 4,
  name: 'Cloud Orchestrator',
  image: '/images/emotion1.png',
  description: 'Designed and developed a Cloud Orchestrator for Docker-based REST API deployment, incorporating load balancing, fault tolerance, and auto-scaling.',
  link: 'https://github.com/Sachu23/Cloud-Orchestrator',
  feature: true,
  techstack: "Python, OpenCV, Keras",
  renderfirst: false
}, {
  id: 5,
  name: 'Speaker Diarization',
  image: '/images/speech.png',
  description: 'Speaker diarization system had to distinguish and find out the timestamps between two speaker changes in a continuous audio file with multiple speakers.',
  link: 'https://github.com/rajatkeshri/Speaker-Diarization-',
  feature: false,
  techstack: "AWS EC2 instance, Docker-Container, ReactJS, NodeJS, MongoDB, Apache Kafka, Zookeeper",
  renderfirst: true
}, {
  id: 6,
  name: 'Stock Market Prediction',
  image: '/images/stock.jpg',
  description: 'A simple stock market prediction using logistic regression',
  link: 'https://github.com/rajatkeshri/Stock-market-prediction',
  feature: false,
  techstack: "Jupyter-Notebook, Keras",
  renderfirst: false
}, {
  id: 7,
  name: 'Decentralised Cloud Storage',
  image: 'images/cloud.png',
  description: 'A simple decentralized cloud storage works on peer to peer communication',
  link: 'https://github.com/rajatkeshri/Decentralised-cloud',
  feature: false,
  techstack: "Python, Socket, Threading",
  renderfirst: false
}, {
  id: 8,
  name: 'Digital Identity System',
  image: '/images/vr.jpg',
  description: 'A prototype blockchain network is created and user digital identity is validated using facial recognition',
  link: 'https://github.com/rajatkeshri/Digital-identity-using-blockchain-network',
  feature: false,
  techstack: "Python, Flask, OpenCV, Keras, Socket, SHA256",
  renderfirst: false
}, {
  id: 9,
  name: 'Pothole Detection',
  image: 'images/pothole.jpg',
  description: 'Pothole detection and mapping using drone footage and Computer vision',
  link: 'https://github.com/rajatkeshri/Techathlon',
  feature: false,
  techstack: "Python, Keras, OpenCV",
  renderfirst: false
}, {
  id: 10,
  name: 'Flood Prediction',
  image: 'images/flood.jpg',
  description: 'Prediction of whether a flood may occur or not, depending rainfall data, using machine learning algorithms',
  link: 'https://github.com/rajatkeshri/Flood-prediction',
  feature: false,
  techstack: "Jupyter-Notebook, Keras",
  renderfirst: false
}, {
  id: 11,
  name: 'Cyberbullying and Sexual Predator Predictor',
  image: 'images/flood.jpg',
  description: 'Built a software that would monitor chat (instagram or whatsapp) and predict if cyberbullying is happening',
  link: 'https://github.com/rajatkeshri/hackthehourglass_sexual_predator',
  feature: false,

  renderfirst: false
}, {
  id: 12,
  name: 'Music Genre Prediction',
  image: 'images/flood.jpg',
  description: 'RNN-LSTM and Deep learning models are build which is used to predict the genre of the song which is given as input to the model.',
  link: 'https://github.com/rajatkeshri/Music-Genre-Prediction-Using-RNN-LSTM',
  feature: false,
  techstack: "Jupyter-Notebook, Keras, RNN, LSTM",
  renderfirst: false
}];

sourcesContent:
export const PROJECTS =
    [
        {
            id: 0,
            name:'Chicago Bikers Real-Time Navigation System',
            image: '/images/attendance.jpg',
            description:'Developed a mobile application using the React Native framework and utilized React and Express JavaScript for the backend.',
            link : "https://github.com/Sachu23/Flutter-Bike_Navigation",
            feature:true,
            techstack: "Flutter, ReactJS, ExpressJS, NodeJS, MongoDB, REST API",
            renderfirst: false
        },
        {
            id: 1,
            name:'MS - GSP (Minimum Support - Generalized Sequential Pattern) Mining Algorithm',
            image: '/images/face.jpg',
            description:'GSP mining can be used to analyze social media data, such as posts and comments, and identify patterns in the data that indicate trends, sentiment, or other insights.',
            link: 'https://github.com/Sachu23/DMTM---MS-GSP-Algo-Implementation',
            feature:false,
            techstack: "Python, Keras, OpenCV",
            renderfirst: true
        },
        {
            id: 2,
            name:'Twitter Sentiment Analysis',
            image: '/images/placements2.png',
            description:'Built a real-time Twitter sentiment analysis app using Twitter API, Apache Kafka for data streaming, NLP techniques, and CNN for sentiment classification. Visualized results with Heat Maps and stored data in MongoDB',
            link: 'https://github.com/Sachu23/Twitter-Setiment-Analysis',
            feature:true,
            techstack: "Microservices, Twitter API, Apache Kafka, Tensor Flow, MongoDB, Docker-Container, Heat Maps.",
            renderfirst:false
        },
        {
         id: 3,
            name:'Ronaldo Goal Prediction',
            image: '/images/ronaldo.jpg',
            description:'Prediction of whether ronaldo scores a goal or not, based on the data given, like x and y position of where the shot is taken and and how much power is applied during the shot.',
            link: 'https://github.com/rajatkeshri/ZS-HACK-predict-ronaldo-goal',
            feature:false,
            techstack: "Jupyter-Notebook, Keras",
            renderfirst: true
        },
        {
            id: 4,
            name:'Cloud Orchestrator',
            image: '/images/emotion1.png',
            description:'Designed and developed a Cloud Orchestrator for Docker-based REST API deployment, incorporating load balancing, fault tolerance, and auto-scaling.',
            link: 'https://github.com/Sachu23/Cloud-Orchestrator',
            feature:true,
            techstack: "Python, OpenCV, Keras",
            renderfirst:false
        },
        {
            id: 5,
            name:'Speaker Diarization',
            image: '/images/speech.png',
            description:'Speaker diarization system had to distinguish and find out the timestamps between two speaker changes in a continuous audio file with multiple speakers.',
            link: 'https://github.com/rajatkeshri/Speaker-Diarization-',
            feature:false,
            techstack: "AWS EC2 instance, Docker-Container, ReactJS, NodeJS, MongoDB, Apache Kafka, Zookeeper",
            renderfirst: true
        },
        {
            id: 6,
            name:'Stock Market Prediction',
            image: '/images/stock.jpg',
            description:'A simple stock market prediction using logistic regression',
            link: 'https://github.com/rajatkeshri/Stock-market-prediction',
            feature:false,
            techstack: "Jupyter-Notebook, Keras",
            renderfirst: false
        },
        {
            id: 7,
            name:'Decentralised Cloud Storage',
            image: 'images/cloud.png',
            description:'A simple decentralized cloud storage works on peer to peer communication',
            link: 'https://github.com/rajatkeshri/Decentralised-cloud',
            feature:false,
            techstack: "Python, Socket, Threading",
            renderfirst: false
        },
        {
            id: 8,
            name:'Digital Identity System',
            image: '/images/vr.jpg',
            description:'A prototype blockchain network is created and user digital identity is validated using facial recognition',
            link: 'https://github.com/rajatkeshri/Digital-identity-using-blockchain-network',
            feature:false,
            techstack: "Python, Flask, OpenCV, Keras, Socket, SHA256",
            renderfirst: false
        },
        {
            id: 9,
            name:'Pothole Detection',
            image: 'images/pothole.jpg',
            description:'Pothole detection and mapping using drone footage and Computer vision',
            link: 'https://github.com/rajatkeshri/Techathlon',
            feature:false,
            techstack: "Python, Keras, OpenCV",
            renderfirst: false
        },
        {
            id: 10,
            name:'Flood Prediction',
            image: 'images/flood.jpg',
            description:'Prediction of whether a flood may occur or not, depending rainfall data, using machine learning algorithms',
            link: 'https://github.com/rajatkeshri/Flood-prediction',
            feature:false,
            techstack: "Jupyter-Notebook, Keras",
            renderfirst: false
        },
        {
            id: 11,
            name:'Cyberbullying and Sexual Predator Predictor',
            image: 'images/flood.jpg',
            description:'Built a software that would monitor chat (instagram or whatsapp) and predict if cyberbullying is happening',
            link: 'https://github.com/rajatkeshri/hackthehourglass_sexual_predator',
            feature:false,
            techstack: "Python, Jupyter-Notebook, Keras, NLP, NLTK",
            renderfirst: false
        },
        {
            id: 12,
            name:'Music Genre Prediction',
            image: 'images/flood.jpg',
            description:'RNN-LSTM and Deep learning models are build which is used to predict the genre of the song which is given as input to the model.',
            link: 'https://github.com/rajatkeshri/Music-Genre-Prediction-Using-RNN-LSTM',
            feature:false,
            techstack: "Jupyter-Notebook, Keras, RNN, LSTM",
            renderfirst: false
        }
        
        
        
    ];
